languages.text: "Аномалии будто бы более милостивы к ксеносам, чем к людям. Муаран отдельно возблагодарил Вашу Светлость за то, что мы воздержались от ударов по оскверненному сектору — якобы это упростит его поход".

"The anomalies seem to be more merciful toward xenos than humans. Muaran specifically thanked Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} for refraining from attacking the corrupted sector — he claims that it has made his journey much easier."
languages.original_text: "Аномалии будто бы более милостивы к ксеносам, чем к людям. Муаран отдельно возблагодарил Вашу Светлость за то, что мы воздержались от ударов по оскверненному сектору — якобы это упростит его поход".

traits.locale_text: "Anomalies seem to be more merciful toward xenos than human. Muaran had separately thanked Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} that you have refrained from attacking the desecrated sector — he claims that it had made his crusade much easier."

"Anomalies seem to be more merciful toward xenos than human. Muaran had separately thanked Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} that you have refrained from attacking the desecrated sector — he claims that it had made his crusade much easier."

"The anomalies seem to be more merciful toward xenos than humans. Muaran specifically thanked Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} for refraining from attacking the corrupted sector — he claims that it has made his journey much easier."

languages.text: “对那些异形而言，幽灵表现出的态度要和善得多。穆兰特地感谢您没有攻击那片腐化区域。他说，这让他的旅程轻松了很多。”
languages.original_text: "The anomalies seem to be more merciful toward xenos than humans. Muaran specifically thanked Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} for refraining from attacking the corrupted sector — he claims that it has made his journey much easier."

traits.locale_text: “对那些异形而言，幽灵表现出的态度要和善得多。穆兰特地感谢您没有攻击那片腐化区域。他说，这让他的旅程轻松了很多。”
“对那些异形而言，幽灵表现出的态度要和善得多。穆兰特地感谢了您没有攻击那片亵渎区域，他说这让他的旅程轻松了很多。”

languages.text: «Las anomalías parecen ser más compasivas con los xenos que con los humanos. Muaran agradeció a mi{mf|lord|lady} que se abstuviera de atacar el sector corrupto, ya que, según afirma, eso le ha facilitado mucho el viaje».
languages.original_text: "The anomalies seem to be more merciful toward xenos than humans. Muaran specifically thanked Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} for refraining from attacking the corrupted sector — he claims that it has made his journey much easier."

traits.locale_text: «Las anomalías parecen ser más compasivas con los xenos que con los humanos. Muaran agradeció a mi{mf|lord|lady} que se abstuviera de atacar el sector corrupto, ya que, según afirma, eso le ha facilitado mucho el viaje».

languages.text: 「アノマリーは人間よりもゼノに慈悲深いようだ。ムアランは個別に、汚されたセクターへの攻撃を差し控えてくれた陛下に感謝していました...そのおかげで旅がずっと楽になったと言っています」
languages.original_text: "The anomalies seem to be more merciful toward xenos than humans. Muaran specifically thanked Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} for refraining from attacking the corrupted sector — he claims that it has made his journey much easier."

traits.locale_text: 「アノマリーは人間よりもゼノに慈悲深いようだ。ムアランは個別に、冒涜されたセクターへの攻撃を差し控えてくれた陛下に感謝していました...そのおかげで旅がずっと楽になったと言っています」
「アノマリーは人間よりもゼノに慈悲深いようだ。ムアランは個別に、冒涜されたセクターへの攻撃を差し控えてくれた陛下に感謝していました...そのおかげで旅がずっと楽になったと言っています」

languages.text: « Les anomalies semblent plus clémentes envers les xénos qu'envers les humains. Muaran a d'ailleurs souhaité remercier personnellement Votre Seigneurie de n'avoir pas attaqué le secteur corrompu, affirmant que sa progression en avait été grandement facilitée. »
languages.original_text: "The anomalies seem to be more merciful toward xenos than humans. Muaran specifically thanked Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} for refraining from attacking the corrupted sector — he claims that it has made his journey much easier."

traits.locale_text: « Les anomalies semblent plus clémentes envers les xénos qu'envers les humains. Muaran a d'ailleurs souhaité remercier personnellement Votre Seigneurie de n'avoir pas attaqué le secteur corrompu, affirmant que sa progression en avait été grandement facilitée. »

languages.text: "Die Anomalien scheinen Xenos gnädiger zu sein als Menschen. Muaran hat Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ausdrücklich dafür gedankt, dass {mf|er|sie} den verderbten Sektor nicht angegriffen hat — Muaran sagt, das habe seine Reise sehr viel leichter gemacht."
languages.original_text: "The anomalies seem to be more merciful toward xenos than humans. Muaran specifically thanked Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} for refraining from attacking the corrupted sector — he claims that it has made his journey much easier."

traits.locale_text: "Die Anomalien scheinen Xenos gnädiger zu sein als Menschen. Muaran hat Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ausdrücklich dafür gedankt, dass {mf|er|sie} den verderbten Sektor nicht angegriffen hat — Muaran sagt, das habe seine Reise sehr viel leichter gemacht."

"Die Anomalien scheinen Xenos gegenüber gnädiger zu sein als Menschen gegenüber. Muaran hat Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} gesondert dafür gedankt, dass {mf|er|sie} den entweihten Sektor nicht angegriffen hat — Muaran sagt, das habe seine Reise sehr viel leichter gemacht."

languages.text: "Anomaliler, insanlara kıyasla zenolara karşı daha merhametli. Muaran, {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'ne yozlaşmış sektöre saldırmaktan geri durduğu için özellikle teşekkür etti. Bu sayede yolculuğunun daha sıkıntısız geçtiğini iddia ediyor."
languages.original_text: "The anomalies seem to be more merciful toward xenos than humans. Muaran specifically thanked Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} for refraining from attacking the corrupted sector — he claims that it has made his journey much easier."

traits.locale_text: "Anomaliler, insanlara kıyasla zenolara karşı daha merhametli. Muaran, {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'ne yozlaşmış sektöre saldırmaktan geri durduğu için özellikle teşekkür etti. Bu sayede yolculuğunun daha sıkıntısız geçtiğini iddia ediyor."
